metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11439 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.Description:
The TagLib::Ogg::FLAC::File::scan function in oggflacfile.cpp in TagLib1.11.1 allows remote attackers to cause information disclosure (heap-basedbuffer over-read) via a crafted audio file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-11439` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtag1v5 - 1.11.1+dfsg.1-0.3
libtag1v5-vanilla - 1.11.1+dfsg.1-0.3
libtagc0 - 1.11.1+dfsg.1-0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: taglib package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.11.1+dfsg.1-0.3').
